channel.title: Cryptography on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Cashing In Early
item.description: Cryptocurrency is having a bit of a moment right now, thanks in no small part to bitcoin, the currency launched under unusual circumstances that has suddenly become really, really popular. (As I write this, it’s continuing its daylong flirtation with the $10,000 valuation mark.) But of course, while cryptocurrency is growing in popularity, bitcoin and other blockchain-based currencies can’t come close to making the claim to being the first digital currency.
